title: Project-Based Learning Program to Enhance Preservice Elementary Teachers' Mathematical Analysis Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics foundational concepts and introductory knowledge of educational principles
context.additional_context: Capable of supporting blended online learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Pre-service elementary teachers can systematically apply data analysis and reasoning processes when solving math problems through PjBL (Project-Based Learning)
Differences in analytical abilities according to the Inquiry Learning (DL), Interactive Demonstration (ID), and Inquiry Lesson (IL) models can be explained
Project activities reflecting analytical thinking can be developed when designing actual elementary math lessons
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
